entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Amazon Linux Runtime IDs native dependencies #62694
  • Issues with the Crc32 intrinsic in the Jit #62692
    7.0.0
  • Skip unnecessary RegexNode reductions in NonBacktracking mode #62681
    7.0.0

Closed

  • StressLogAnalyzer is failing to build #62664
  • Blazor WASM debugging stops working with VS 2022 RC. Server side still works. #61531
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_16833/Test16833/Test16833.sh #61050
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove small casts on the RHS of `ASG(CLS_VAR)` #62693
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add custom marshaller tests for delegates #62691
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • .NET number values such as positive and negative infinity cannot be written as valid JSON. #62690
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix duplicated FldSeq in block morphing #62687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not contain zeroes for `STOREIND(CLS_VAR_ADDR)` #62686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Don't create multiple large files at the same time #62519
    area-System.IO, test enhancement
  • Unify the namespaces of HashProviderDispenser #62590
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Cleanup, use camel case name conventions of method parameters #62633
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Workaround clang crash due to large array assignment #62675
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix gcc warnings in mono #62684
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix errors in Clang 13 #62685
    community-contribution
  • Replace CorInfoIntrinsics with NamedIntrinsic #62639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move a few vendor libraries to src/native/external #62673
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Two small fixes for the recently merged in merged wrapper logic #62683
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1509406 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Removing trailing dot from a SNI host in TLS #62540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adds BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62679
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • JIT: handle more cases for MOD/DIV -> UMOD/UDIV transformation #62394
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62428
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Build NativeAOT flavor of clrcompression static lib #62570
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT] ld does not support aarch64linux #1785

Closed

  • [NativeAOT] Build in Linux-X64 #1784

PullRequests

Merged

  • Undo MUSL changes #1782
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • Custom marshaller work. #1723

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet format produces false positives on CS0234 and CS0103 #20126

Updated

  • net core 3.0 (and higher) publish project with wrong dependencies #3886
  • Support additional target frameworks such as for Xamarin, UWP, etc #491
    Backlog
  • NETSDK1100 blocks building on Linux #3592
    Discussion

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Fixed-size buffer of unmanaged Types. #5531

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set
  • Proposal: Expression blocks #3086
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How about MemberNotNullWhenResultNotNullAttribute? #58291
  • UserFunctionException --> OperationCanceledException in SourceGeneration/Nodes/SyntaxReceiverInputNode.cs:line 81 #58290
  • Developers get guidance on best practices when writing C# or VB code #58289
  • The SDK 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk' specified could not be found. #58286

Closed

  • Proposal: provide trigger info to generators to enable more expensive workloads #51497
    17.1
  • Pattern matching: exhaustiveness check doesn't take null into account while nullable is disabled #58287

PullRequests

Created

  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check operations when doing type name simplification #58285
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update instructions for building runtime repo #58172
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58284
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #58283
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58282
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #58281
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix stack exhaustion when parsing large regex alternating sequences. #58254
    Area-IDE
  • Add VSTypeScriptBlockStructure external access APIs #58252
    Area-IDE
  • Suggest parameter names from matching overloads #52801
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE
  • Record list-patterns and newlines in interpolations as done #58250
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix regression of LambdaSymbol.GetHashCode #58247
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IHostingStartup implementations not called by ResolveServiceProviderFactory #38977
  • SignalR connection failed when not on localhost #38976
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, endpoint #38975
  • Perf improvement: updates #38974
  • How to access PageModel in classlibrary #38972
  • Razor Page loses content when running hot reload with watch flag and tailwindcss class change #38971
  • Blazor with WPF and WebView2: Scoped CSS files not found #38970
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38968
  • Proposal to change the way shorthand command line arguments are parsed #38967

Closed

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #38935

PullRequests

Created

  • Add EmptyContent to Virtualize #38978
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Updated

  • Revert .NET SDK test bump, again #38937
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Remove a superfluous cache in `RouteValueDictionary`. #38660
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix RedisCache update that breaks usage against older redis servers #38927
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Multidimensional array regression from NET 5 > 6 - The type Double[,] does not represent a sequence #26975
  • Referencing Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Tools from a WASDK 1.0 / WinUI 3 / .NET 6 project causes build to fail. #26973
  • SQL Server basic translations for AT TIME ZONE #26971
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Store column order in model snapshot #26956
  • EF Core 6.0 temporal tables - Add-Migration - Period property 'Comment.PeriodStart' must be a shadow property #26960

PullRequests

Created

  • Not test left behind: Ef6GroupByTest #26974
  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Static analysis: revert tail recursion unrolling #26970

Updated

  • Static analysis: deconstruction #26969
  • SQL row value comparison syntax #26936
